page.title: 07Life in Moy
page.content: Moy is a quiet place. It is far away from shops. We have to travel 12 miles to Inverness to go shopping. We have a grocer's van, a post van, a mik van, a coalman and mobile library. People here like the peace and the freedom. Children usually play out of doors or watch television. The Rockery is a favourite place to play. Most of the houses are old and have two storeys with gardens. They are far apart. The average family size is 4. Most people have their own cars, two have motor bikes. Children cycle to school. HOUSE NAMES _ Foresters House Forestry Cottages Garden Cottage Moy Mains Moymore The Kennels House The Old Manse
